display_long_description:
SeeSignal is an innovative productivity and learning tool that harnesses the power of immersive technology to visualize previously invisible wireless signal data as engaging, interactive holograms, overlaid onto real-world environments. Explore your room, home, or office to quickly discover hot spots and dead zones.

Using cutting-edge data spatialization and sampling algorithms – the SeeSignal app quickly discovers wireless networks in your local environment, allowing you to simply and easily select one (or more) networks to visualize, holographically. Simply reach out and touch these holograms to get accurate signal readings anywhere in space!

Additional app features include accessibility support for colorblind users, gadgets that allow you to locate equipment, and a first-ever ‘WiFi hands’ option! Controllers are not required but can be used if desired.
